participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Lily is playful, imaginative, and curious. She loves to explore and enjoys storytelling.
participant_1.background: My mommy makes me a picnic lunch to eat outside. I like playing outside in the sun with my dolls. My daddy brings home flowers for me. I'm a four year old girl with brown eyes and hair.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Ethan is thoughtful, introverted, and a bit of a daydreamer. He enjoys quiet activities and prefers reading over playing outside.
participant_2.background: I wish that I lived in the city. I have allergies. I live on a pig farm. I dislike animals. I am a vegetarian.

content.text: Hi, I'm [girl's name].
Nice to meet you, [girl's name]. I'm [boy's name].
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, play video games, and go online.
I like to read too! What are your favorite books?
I like fantasy and science fiction books.
Me too! I'm reading a book about a group of kids who go on an adventure to find a magical sword.
That sounds cool! I like books about magic and adventure.
What do you like to do on the farm?
I don't really like working on the farm, but I like helping out with the animals.
What kind of animals do you have?
We have pigs, cows, chickens, and ducks.
I've never been to a pig farm before. Do you have any pictures of the animals?
Sure, I can show you some pictures.
They're so cute! I love the pigs.
They're my favorite animals too.
Do you ever get to play with the animals?
Sometimes, but we have to be careful because they can be dangerous.
I can imagine. Do you ever get any injuries from the animals?
Not too often, but I've been bitten a few times.
That sounds scary.
It can be, but it's usually not too bad.
I'm glad to hear that.
Me too.
